DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine multiple dos canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) affect pharmacokinetics ( ie , body affect drug ) multiple dose digoxin . The safety tolerability canagliflozin also assess healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effects Canagliflozin ( JNJ-28431754 ) Pharmacokinetics Safety Digoxin Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: This study open label ( volunteer study staff know identity assign treatment ) , randomize ( treatment assign chance ) , multiple dose , cross-over study ( volunteer switch one treatment another ) determine canagliflozin ( drug currently investigate treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ) affect pharmacokinetics digoxin ( drug use treat various heart condition ) . Volunteers randomly assign 1 2 treatment sequence group : Group AB Group BA . Volunteers assign Group AB give Treatment A : digoxin day 7 day . Volunteers assign Group BA give Treatment B : digoxin canagliflozin day 7 day . A washout period ( medication give ) least 14 day follow first 7-day treatment period . Following washout period , volunteer assign treatment receive first treatment period . This second treatment period last 7 day . Each volunteer participate study approximately 60 day .
DOC.criteria: Volunteers must body mass index ( BMI = weight kg/height m2 ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) , body weight less 50 kg History , current active illness , consider clinically significant Investigator , illness Investigator considers exclude patient study , could interfere interpretation study result
